text: Kanchan Awasthihttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/topic/Kanchan-Awasthi is an Indian model and actress. She has appeared in the Indian television show Amma and Hindi movies including Gunwali Dulhaniya, Fraud Saiyaan, Ankur Arora Murder Case, Jai Jawaan Jai Kisaan and Chapekar Brothers. ==Movies== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! style="background:#CCC;" | Year(s) ! style="background:#CCC;" | Title ! style="background:#CCC;" | Character |- | 2019 | Gunwali Dulhaniyahttps://skjbollywoodnews.com/first-poster-of-upcoming- rom-com-bollywood-movie-gunwali-dulhaniya/ | Sharmili Royhttps://www.haribhoomi.com/entertainment/kanchan-awasthi-interview-kanchan- talk-about-her-acting-journey-286913 |- |- | 2019 | Fraud Saiyyan | Namita |- | 2018 | Bhootwali Love Story | Madhubala (ghost) |- | 2018 | Main Khudiram Bose Hun | Nanibala |- | 2016 | Chapekar Brothers | Balkrishna Chapekar's wife |- | 2015 | Jai Jawaan Jai Kisaan | Lalita Devi's sister in law |- | 2013 | Ankur Arora Murder Case | Dr. Hiya Shah |- |} ==Television== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! style="background:#CCC;" | Year(s) ! style="background:#CCC;" | Title ! style="background:#CCC;" | Character ! style="background:#CCC;" | Language ! style="background:#CCC;" | Remarks |- | 2016 | Amma | Sarla | Hindi | Zee Tv |- | 2014 | Aati Ranhegi Bahare | Aarohi | Hindi | Shagun TV |- | 2013 | Mera Gaon Mera Desh | Kusum | Hindi | Doordarshan |- |} ==Awards== * Mumbai Global Achievers (2016) * India Unbound best upcoming actress (2018) ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Actresses from Lucknow Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:21st-century Indian actresses Category:Actresses in Hindi cinema Category:Actresses in Hindi television Category:Indian film actresses Category:Indian television actresses
